actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that vocational education shall be treated equally with other education.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that vocational education shall be treated equally with other forms of education by the Congress, the Office of Education, and all executive agencies administering educational programs.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that vocational education shall be treated equally with other education.
